sentences.en: An equilateral triangle cannot be dissected into finitely many incongruent equilateral triangles.
sentences.cn: 等边三角形不能分成有限多个不全等的等边三角形.

sentences.en: Combine, and recombine, ideas , images, and thoughts into different combinations no matter how incongruent or unusual.
sentences.cn: 用不同的方式去组合和重组思想, 图象, 无论它有多失调或者奇怪.

words.tran_cn: 不一致的；不协调的；不和谐的；不合适的（名词incongruence，副词incongruently）
